gaffer.store

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaffer.store.Store
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccumuloStore, ArrayListStore

    public abstract class Store
extends Object
    A Store backs a Graph and is responsible for storing the Elements and handling Operations. Operations and their corresponding OperationHandlers are registered in a map and used to handle provided operations - allowing different store implementations to handle the same operations in their own store specific way. Optional functionality can be added to store implementations defined by the StoreTraits.

      • hasTrait

        public boolean hasTrait(StoreTrait storeTrait)
        Returns true if the Store can handle the provided trait and false if it cannot.
        Parameters:
        storeTrait - the Class of the Processor to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the Processor can be handled and false if it cannot.

      • getTraits

        public abstract Set<StoreTrait> getTraits()
        Returns the StoreTraits for this store. Most stores should support FILTERING.

        If you use Operation.validateFilter(Element) in you handlers, it will deal with the filtering for you.

        Returns:
        the StoreTraits for this store.

      • isValidationRequired

        public abstract boolean isValidationRequired()
        Returns:
        true if the store requires validation, so it requires Validatable operations to have a validation step.

      • execute

        public <OPERATION extends Operation<?,OUTPUT>,OUTPUT> OUTPUT execute(OPERATION operation,
                                                                     User user)
                                                              throws OperationException
        Executes a given operation and returns the result.
        Type Parameters:
        OPERATION - the operation type
        OUTPUT - the output type.
        Parameters:
        operation - the operation to execute.
        user - the user executing the operation
        Returns:
        the result from the operation
        Throws:
        OperationException - thrown by the operation handler if the operation fails.

      • execute

        public <OUTPUT> OUTPUT execute(OperationChain<OUTPUT> operationChain,
                               User user)
                        throws OperationException
        Executes a given operation chain and returns the result.
        Type Parameters:
        OUTPUT - the output type of the operation.
        Parameters:
        operationChain - the operation chain to execute.
        user - the user executing the operation chain
        Returns:
        the result of executing the operation.
        Throws:
        OperationException - thrown by an operation handler if an operation fails

      • populateElement

        public Element populateElement(Element lazyElement)
        Ensures all identifier and property values are populated on an element by triggering getters on the element for all identifier and properties in the Schema forcing a lazy element to load all of its values.
        Parameters:
        lazyElement - the lazy element
        Returns:
        the fully populated unwrapped element

      • getSchema

        public Schema getSchema()
        Get this Store's Schema.
        Returns:
        the instance of Schema used for describing the type of Elements to be stored and how to aggregate the elements.
